title: Wireless Stepper Motor Controller with ESP32 and TMC2240
shortDescription: WiFi-enabled ESP32 stepper motor control system that allows precise positioning, performance monitoring, and real-time feedback directly through a web browser—making remote motor control simple and intuitive.

detailSections.title: Introduction
detailSections.content: This project implements a WiFi-enabled stepper motor controller using ESP32 and TMC2240 drivers. It provides a web interface for precise motor control, performance monitoring, and real-time feedback.

detailSections.title: Features
detailSections.content:
• **WiFi Control**: Operated via a custom mobile app over Bluetooth/WiFi.
• **Real-time Feedback**: Provides instant performance data and motor status.
• **Precise Control**: Offers smooth and accurate motor movements.
